attributes.action: Allow all Gurkah's who fought and served this country the right to live in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The right to allow the Gurkah's who served and fought for this country less than 20 years ago with the British Army to live in this country of there own free will as they have earned that right to do so!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
